A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: About as bad as it gets for Star Wars. I rewatched the newer prequels from the 2000s and I couldn't help but find a extreme gulf between this atrocity and the genius plot from before. I couldn't name half the characters minutes after leaving the theater and couldn't for the life of me remember what the whole plot even attempted to achieve. What a travesty of a movie and worse still that they dragged the Star Wars name with it.
